roleset.name: praise highly
roleset.note: EULOGIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'eulogize' based on dictionary.com. VerbNet entry 33. (from eulogize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: basic
example.text: In the medieval city of Limerick, Ireland, hundreds of mourners eulogize a loving husband and father
